title: The Movies, Music, and TV That Helped Us Through 2020, With Jason Mantzoukas
description:
Chris and Andy are joined by Jason Mantzoukas to talk about some of the pop culture that helped them through 2020 (1:51), how COVID might impact future art (17:19), and a range of other thoughts on this year in pop culture (42:17).

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald
Guest: Jason Mantzoukas
